scripts.setup: cp prisma/schema.production.prisma prisma/schema.prisma && bunx prisma generate
scripts.start: bun install && bun run setup && bun run migrate && bun run index.js
scripts.prisma:deploy: cp prisma/schema.production.prisma prisma/schema.prisma && bunx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.production: bun install && bun run setup && bun run migrate && bun run index.js
